title: Samir Abdul-Ridha
text: Samir Abdul-Ridha (born 1 July 1960) is a former <a href="Iraqi%20people">Iraqi</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="Iraq%20national%20football%20team">Iraq</a> in the <a href="Football%20at%20the%201986%20Asian%20Games">1986 Asian Games</a>. He played for the national team between 1981 and 1986.
